channel.title: Safe zone help here!
channel.description:
Open your client.java and search for
[code]public boolean nonWild() {[/code]
You should come up with something like this
[code]public boolean nonWild() { if((absX >= 3249 && absX <= 3258 && absY >= 3438 && absY <=3431 ) || heightLevel == 1) return true; else return false; }[/code]
Next hit space after the "if((absX >= 3249 && absX <= 3258 && absY >= 3438 && absY <=3431 ) ||"
and add (absX >= XXXX && absX <= XXXX && absY >= YYYY && absY <=YYYY ) ||
Now go into your server and go to the most South-Western point of the area, find the cordinates in that spot and write it down. Now go to the most North-Eastern spot of the area and get those cordinates and write them down.
Now go back to where you added the if((absX >= XXXX && absX <= XXXX && absY >= YYYY && absY <=YYYY ) ||, and in the first X and Y put the south-western cordinates, and in the second X and Y put the north-eastern cordinates.
Now just save, compile, and run.
Hope it worked.
100% credit to :Mr Erik

item.title: Safe zone help here!
item.dc:creator: @i0wnuall i0wnuall
item.description:
@i0wnuall wrote:

Open your client.java and search for

public boolean nonWild() {

You should come up with something like this

public boolean nonWild() { if((absX >= 3249 && absX <= 3258 && absY >= 3438 && absY <=3431 ) || heightLevel == 1) return true; else return false; }

Next hit space after the “if((absX >= 3249 && absX <= 3258 && absY >= 3438 && absY <=3431 ) ||”

and add (absX >= XXXX && absX <= XXXX && absY >= YYYY && absY <=YYYY ) ||

Now go into your server and go to the most South-Western point of the area, find the cordinates in that spot and write it down. Now go to the most North-Eastern spot of the area and get those cordinates and write them down.

Now go back to where you added the if((absX >= XXXX && absX <= XXXX && absY >= YYYY && absY <=YYYY ) ||, and in the first X and Y put the south-western cordinates, and in the second
X and Y put the north-eastern cordinates.

Now just save, compile, and run.

Hope it worked.

100% credit to :Mr Erik
